#Kolektiv SuperCollider shared files

##recent utilities

* Jachym's JMix
* image spectral player
* some [autogenerated code statistics](https://github.com/k-o-l-e-k-t-i-v/supercollider/tree/master/utils/lang_statistics) /w GnuPlot
